verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> now it was אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass after כֵ֗ן <WH3651> this וּלְאַבְשָׁל֧וֹם <WH53> this that Absalom בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> of David אָח֥וֹת <WH269> sister יָפָ֖ה <WH3303> had a fair וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <WH8034> whose name תָּמָ֑ר <WH8559> [was] Tamar וַיֶּאֱהָבֶ֖הָ <WH157> loved אַמְנ֥וֹן <WH550> and Amnon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיֵּ֨צֶר <WH3334> was so vexed לְאַמְנ֜וֹן <WH550> And Amnon לְהִתְחַלּ֗וֹת <WH2470> that he fell sick בַּֽעֲבוּר֙ <WH5668> because תָּמָ֣ר <WH8559> Tamar אֲחֹת֔וֹ <WH269> for his sister כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בְתוּלָ֖ה <WH1330> for she [was] a virgin הִ֑יא <WH1931> and it וַיִּפָּלֵא֙ <WH6381> it hard בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> thought אַמְנ֔וֹן <WH550> and Amnon לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> for him to do לָ֖הּ מְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> any thing

וּלְאַמְנ֣וֹן <WH550> But Amnon רֵ֗עַ <WH7453> had a friend וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> whose name יֽוֹנָדָ֔ב <WH3122> [was] Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁמְעָ֖ה <WH8093> of Shimeah אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> David's וְי֣וֹנָדָ֔ב <WH3122> and Jonadab אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man חָכָ֖ם <WH2450> subtil מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [was] a very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֗וֹ מַדּ֣וּעַ <WH4069> why אַ֠תָּה <WH859> are you כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> so דַּ֤ל <WH1800> lean בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> unto him Why [art] thou [being] the king's בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> from day בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> morning הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not תַּגִּ֣יד <WH5046> bewray לִ֑י וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ אַמְנ֔וֹן <WH550> me? And Amnon אֶת־ <WH853> תָּמָ֗ר <WH8559> Tamar אֲח֛וֹת <WH269> sister אַבְשָׁלֹ֥ם <WH53> Absalom's אָחִ֖י <WH251> my brother אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am אֹהֵֽב׃ <WH157> unto him I love

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ יְה֣וֹנָדָ֔ב <WH3082> And Jonadab שְׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> unto him Lay thee down עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <WH4904> on thy bed וְהִתְחָ֑ל <WH2470> and make thyself sick וּבָ֧א <WH935> cometh אָבִ֣יךָ <WH1> and when thy father לִרְאוֹתֶ֗ךָ <WH7200> to see וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> thee say אֵלָ֡יו <WH413> about תָּ֣בֹא <WH935> come נָא֩ <WH4994> Please תָמָ֨ר <WH8559> Tamar אֲחוֹתִ֜י <WH269> unto him I pray thee let my sister וְתַבְרֵ֣נִי <WH1262> and give לֶ֗חֶם <WH3899> me meat וְעָשְׂתָ֤ה <WH6213> and dress לְעֵינַי֙ <WH5869> in my sight אֶת־ <WH853> הַבִּרְיָ֔ה <WH1279> the meat לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> that אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i אֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> that I may see וְאָכַלְתִּ֖י <WH398> [it] and eat מִיָּדָֽהּ׃ <WH3027> [it] at her hand

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> lay down אַמְנ֖וֹן <WH550> So Amnon וַיִּתְחָ֑ל <WH2470> and made himself sick וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> was come הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> and when the king לִרְאֹת֗וֹ <WH7200> to see וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אַמְנ֤וֹן <WH550> him Amnon אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> unto the king תָּֽבוֹא־ <WH935> come נָ֞א <WH4994> Please תָּמָ֣ר <WH8559> I pray thee let Tamar אֲחֹתִ֗י <WH269> my sister וּתְלַבֵּ֤ב <WH3823> and make לְעֵינַי֙ <WH5869> in my sight שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> me a couple לְבִב֔וֹת <WH3834> of cakes וְאֶבְרֶ֖ה <WH1262> that I may eat מִיָּדָֽהּ׃ <WH3027> at her hand

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> Then David אֶל־ <WH413> about תָּמָ֖ר <WH8559> to Tamar הַבַּ֣יְתָה <WH1004> home לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לְכִ֣י <WH1980> Go נָ֗א <WH4994> now בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> house אַמְנ֣וֹן <WH550> Amnon's אָחִ֔יךְ <WH251> now to thy brother וַעֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> and dress ל֖וֹ הַבִּרְיָֽה׃ <WH1279> him meat

וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went תָּמָ֗ר <WH8559> So Tamar בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> house אַמְנ֥וֹן <WH550> Amnon's אָחִ֖יהָ <WH251> to her brother וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and he שֹׁכֵ֑ב <WH7901> and he was laid down וַתִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> And she took אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּצֵ֤ק <WH1217> flour [וַתָּלֹושׁ כ] (וַתָּ֙לָשׁ֙ <WH3888> knead ק) וַתְּלַבֵּ֣ב <WH3823> [it] and made cakes לְעֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> in his sight וַתְּבַשֵּׁ֖ל <WH1310> and did bake אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְּבִבֽוֹת׃ <WH3834> the cakes

וַתִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> And she took אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּשְׂרֵת֙ <WH4958> a pan וַתִּצֹ֣ק <WH3332> and poured [them] out לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before וַיְמָאֵ֖ן <WH3985> him but he refused לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> to eat וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַמְנ֗וֹן <WH550> And Amnon הוֹצִ֤יאוּ <WH3318> Have out כָל־ <WH3605> all אִישׁ֙ <WH376> all men מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <WH3318> from me And they went out כָל־ <WH3605> every אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אַמְנ֜וֹן <WH550> And Amnon אֶל־ <WH413> to תָּמָ֗ר <WH8559> unto Tamar הָבִ֤יאִי <WH935> Bring הַבִּרְיָה֙ <WH1279> the meat הַחֶ֔דֶר <WH2315> into the chamber וְאֶבְרֶ֖ה <WH1262> that I may eat מִיָּדֵ֑ךְ <WH3027> of thine hand וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took תָּמָ֗ר <WH8559> And Tamar אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְּבִבוֹת֙ <WH3834> the cakes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔תָה <WH6213> which she had made וַתָּבֵ֛א <WH935> and brought לְאַמְנ֥וֹן <WH550> to Amnon אָחִ֖יהָ <WH251> her brother הֶחָֽדְרָה׃ <WH2315> [them] into the chamber

וַתַּגֵּ֥שׁ <WH5066> And when she had brought אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to לֶֽאֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> [them] unto him to eat וַיַּֽחֲזֶק־ <WH2388> he took hold בָּהּ֙ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> of her and said לָ֔הּ בּ֛וֹאִי <WH935> unto her Come שִׁכְבִ֥י <WH7901> lie עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> with אֲחוֹתִֽי׃ <WH269> with me my sister

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she answered ל֗וֹ אַל־ <WH408> No אָחִי֙ <WH251> him Nay my brother אַל־ <WH408> No תְּעַנֵּ֔נִי <WH6031> do not force כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> to be done כֵ֖ן <WH3651> me for no such thing ought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אַֽל־ <WH408> No תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> do אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <WH5039> not thou this folly הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> for

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> me אָ֤נָה <WH575> where אוֹלִיךְ֙ <WH1980> get אֶת־ <WH853> חֶרְפָּתִ֔י <WH2781> And I whither shall I cause my shame וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תִּהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> shalt be as כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> ? and as for thee thou shalt be as one הַנְּבָלִ֖ים <WH5036> of the fools בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now דַּבֶּר־ <WH1696> Now therefore I pray thee speak נָ֣א <WH4994> please אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יִמְנָעֵ֖נִי <WH4513> for he will not withhold מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> at

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> Howbeit he would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken בְּקוֹלָ֑הּ <WH6963> unto her voice וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> but being stronger מִמֶּ֙נָּה֙ <WH4480> than וַיְעַנֶּ֔הָ <WH6031> than she forced וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> her and lay אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH854> for

וַיִּשְׂנָאֶ֣הָ <WH8130> hated אַמְנ֗וֹן <WH550> Then Amnon שִׂנְאָה֙ <WH8135> so that the hatred גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> her [was] greater מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> A very כִּ֣י <WH3588> for גְדוֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> her was greater הַשִּׂנְאָה֙ <WH8135> the hatred אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שְׂנֵאָ֔הּ <WH8130> wherewith he hated מֵאַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> than the love אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֲהֵבָ֑הּ <WH157> wherewith he had loved וַֽיֹּאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֥הּ אַמְנ֖וֹן <WH550> her And Amnon ק֥וּמִי <WH6965> unto her Arise לֵֽכִי׃ <WH1980> go

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said ל֗וֹ אַל־ <WH408> No אוֹדֹ֞ת <WH182> unto him [There is] no cause הָרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> this evil הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> [is] greater הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise מֵאַחֶ֛רֶת <WH312> than the other אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> that thou didst עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> in לְשַׁלְּחֵ֑נִי <WH7971> in sending me away וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> unto me But he would לִשְׁמֹ֥עַֽ <WH8085> not hearken לָֽהּ׃

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> Then he called אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲרוֹ֙ <WH5288> his servant מְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <WH8334> that ministered וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said שִׁלְחוּ־ <WH7971> Put נָ֥א <WH4994> Now אֶת־ <WH853> זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise מֵעָלַ֖י <WH5921> now הַח֑וּצָה <WH2351> now this [woman] out וּנְעֹ֥ל <WH5274> from me and bolt הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> the door אַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH310> after

וְעָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and כְּתֹ֣נֶת <WH3801> And [she had] a garment פַּסִּ֔ים <WH6446> of divers colours כִּי֩ <WH3588> in כֵ֨ן <WH3651> this תִּלְבַּ֧שְׁןָ <WH3847> apparelled בְנוֹת־ <WH1323> daughters הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> were the king's הַבְּתוּלֹ֖ת <WH1330> [that were] virgins מְעִילִ֑ים <WH4598> upon her for with such robes וַיֹּצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought אוֹתָ֤הּ <WH853> מְשָֽׁרְתוֹ֙ <WH8334> Then his servant הַח֔וּץ <WH2351> her out וְנָעַ֥ל <WH5274> and bolted הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> the door אַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH310> after

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> put תָּמָ֥ר <WH8559> And Tamar אֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH665> ashes עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <WH7218> on her head וּכְתֹ֧נֶת <WH3801> her garment הַפַּסִּ֛ים <WH6446> of divers colours אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and קָרָ֑עָה <WH7167> and rent וַתָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> that [was] on her and laid יָדָהּ֙ <WH3027> her hand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <WH7218> on her head וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> on הָל֖וֹךְ <WH1980> went וְזָעָֽקָה׃ <WH2199> crying

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֜יהָ <WH413> then אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH53> And Absalom אָחִ֗יהָ <WH251> her brother הַאֲמִינ֣וֹן <WH550> unto her Hath Amnon אָחִיךְ֮ <WH251> thy brother הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> been עִמָּךְ֒ <WH5973> But וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> now אֲחוֹתִ֤י <WH269> my sister הַחֲרִ֙ישִׁי֙ <WH2790> been with thee? but hold now thy peace אָחִ֣יךְ <WH251> he [is] thy brother ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אַל־ <WH408> not תָּשִׁ֥יתִי <WH7896> take אֶת־ <WH853> לִבֵּ֖ךְ <WH3820> to heart לַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> not this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> remained תָּמָר֙ <WH8559> So Tamar וְשֹׁ֣מֵמָ֔ה <WH8076> desolate בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> house אַבְשָׁל֥וֹם <WH53> Absalom's אָחִֽיהָ׃ <WH251> in her brother

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> But when king דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David שָׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> heard אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> of all these things הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> wroth ל֖וֹ מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> he was very

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not דִבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> spake אַבְשָׁל֛וֹם <WH53> And Absalom עִם־ <WH5973> with אַמְנ֖וֹן <WH550> unto his brother Amnon לְמֵרָ֣ע <WH7451> nor bad וְעַד־ <WH5704> either ט֑וֹב <WH2896> neither good כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׂנֵ֤א <WH8130> hated אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> for Absalom אֶת־ <WH853> אַמְנ֔וֹן <WH550> Amnon עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַר֙ <WH1697> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עִנָּ֔ה <WH6031> he had forced אֵ֖ת <WH853> תָּמָ֥ר <WH8559> Tamar אֲחֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH269> his sister פ
